data.title: Make a slang converter!
data.statement:
You are given a [[message]] and the intended [[tone]], and you have to convert it into slang, using the following rules:
<<1)>> Convert all words to lowercase.
<<2)>> Remove all punctuation marks ({{,}} {{.}} {{?}} {{;}} {{'}} and {{!}}).
<<3)>> If a word's length is between 5 and 8 (inclusive) and contains fewer than 45% vowels, remove all vowels from the word ({{a}}, {{e}}, {{i}}, {{o}}, {{u}})
(Except for words following condition 4)
<<4)>> Do not shorten words that start with an uppercase letter or words ending in "ing."
({{Graham}} should not be converted to {{grhm}}, it should be kept as {{graham}})
<<5)>> Append a word to the end of the sentence based on the intended [[tone]]:
{{Funny}}: Add {{lol}} to the end.
{{Sad}}: Add {{:(}} to the end.
{{Happy}}: Add {{:)}} to the end.
{{Joyous}}: Add {{:D}} to the end.
If the tone is {{None}}, do not add any word to the end.

testCases.title: Casual intro
testCases.testIn:
None
Hi everyone, my name is Jonathan.
testCases.testOut: hi everyone my name is jonathan

testCases.title: This is me
testCases.testIn:
None
Hello chat, I am Vicky.

testCases.title: Feeling happy
testCases.testIn:
Happy
Don't worry, it's not a problem at all.
testCases.testOut: dont wrry its not a prblm at all :)

testCases.title: Under the weather
testCases.testIn:
Sad
I'm feeling a bit sick.

testCases.title: Spilled milk
testCases.testIn:
Sad
Oh no, I forgot to save my project.
testCases.testOut: oh no i frgt to save my prjct :(

testCases.title: Yippee!
testCases.testIn:
Joyous
I defeated the final boss!

testCases.title: Excitement
testCases.testIn:
Joyous
I'm getting a new laptop!

data.constraints: The length of the [[message]] can be up to 50 characters.
data.stubGenerator:
read tone:string(6)
read message:string(50)
write Print the message converted to slang
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> The intended [[tone]] of the message
<<Line 2:>> The [[message]]

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are given a message and the intended tone, and you have to convert it into slang, using the following rules:
1) Convert all words to lowercase.
2) Remove all punctuation marks (, . ? ; ' and !).
3) If a word's length is between 5 and 8 (inclusive) and contains fewer than 45% vowels, remove all vowels from the word (a, e, i, o, u)
(Except for words following condition 4)
4) Do not shorten words that start with an uppercase letter or words ending in "ing."
(Graham should not be converted to grhm, it should be kept as graham)
5) Append a word to the end of the sentence based on the intended tone:
Funny: Add lol to the end.
Sad: Add :( to the end.
Happy: Add :) to the end.
Joyous: Add :D to the end.
If the tone is None, do not add any word to the end.
Input
Line 1: The intended tone of the message
Line 2: The message
Output
Line 1: The converted message in slang.
Constraints
The length of the message can be up to 50 characters.
Example
Input
None
Hi everyone, my name is Jonathan.
Output
hi everyone my name is jonathan
